languages.text: "Какой — "такой"? Обычной? Нормальной? Да в пропасть этот "дар", эти "способности"! Я свои мысли впервые слышу, {name}! Свои, а не каких-то выродков из варпа! Свои, а не будущие мыслишки и слова какого-то случайного лексмеханика у соседнего когитатора!"

"Like what? Normal? Not special? Yes! To the void with all my 'talents' and 'abilities'! It's the first time I can hear my own thoughts, {name}! They're mine, not some warp abomination's! And not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic at the cogitator next to me!"
languages.original_text: "Какой — "такой"? Обычной? Нормальной? Да в пропасть этот "дар", эти "способности"! Я свои мысли впервые слышу, {name}! Свои, а не каких-то выродков из варпа! Свои, а не будущие мыслишки и слова какого-то случайного лексмеханика у соседнего когитатора!"

traits.locale_text: "Like what? Normal? Not special? To the void with all my 'talents' and 'abilities'! It's the first time I can hear my own thoughts, {name}! They're mine, not some warp abomination's! Not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic standing by a cogitator next to me!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Like what? Normal? Not special? To the void with all my 'talents' and 'abilities'! It's the first time I can hear my own thoughts, {name}! They're mine, not some warp abomination's! Not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic standing by a cogitator next to me!"

They're mine, not some warp abomination's! Not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic standing by a cogitator next to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Like what? Normal? Not special? Yes! To the void with all my 'talents' and 'abilities'! It's the first time I can hear my own thoughts, {name}! They're mine, not some warp abomination's! And not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic at the cogitator next to me!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Like what? Normal? Not special? Yes! To the void with all my 'talents' and 'abilities'! It's the first time I can hear my own thoughts, {name}! They're mine, not some warp abomination's! And not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic at the cogitator next to me!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「例えば？普通？特別じゃない？ハッ！私のすべての『才能』と『能力』を持って、虚空へ行く！初めて自分の考えを聞くことができたわ、{name}！〈歪み〉の忌まわしき者のものではなく、私の考えよ！隣の考算機のそばにいる、どこかの法技術者の未来の考えや言葉じゃなくてね！」
languages.original_text: "Like what? Normal? Not special? Yes! To the void with all my 'talents' and 'abilities'! It's the first time I can hear my own thoughts, {name}! They're mine, not some warp abomination's! And not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic at the cogitator next to me!"

traits.locale_text: 「例えば？普通？特別じゃない？ハッ！私のすべての『才能』と『能力』を持って、虚空へ行く！初めて自分の考えを聞くことができたわ、{name}！〈歪み〉の忌まわしき者のものではなく、私の考えよ！隣の考算機のそばにいる、どこかの法技術者の未来の考えや言葉じゃなくてね！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “什么样的生活？正常的生活吗？一点都不特别的生活吗？没错！我只希望我那些‘能力’与‘力量’统统滚蛋！这是我第一次听到我自己的想法，{name}！这些都是我的想法，不是亚空间那些怪物的想法！也不是某个站在沉思者旁边的思律机僧，对我没完没了地唠唠叨叨！”
languages.original_text: "Like what? Normal? Not special? Yes! To the void with all my 'talents' and 'abilities'! It's the first time I can hear my own thoughts, {name}! They're mine, not some warp abomination's! And not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic at the cogitator next to me!"

traits.locale_text: “什么样的生活？正常的生活吗？一点都不特别的生活吗？我只希望我那些‘能力’与‘力量’统统滚蛋！这是我第一次听到我自己的想法，{name}！这些都是我的想法，不是亚空间那些怪物的想法！也不是某个站在思考器旁边的法律技工，对我没完没了地唠唠叨叨！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¿Como qué? ¿Normal? ¿Nada especial? ¡Al vacío con mis "talentos" y "capacidades"! ¡Es la primera vez que oigo mis propios pensamientos, {name}! ¡Son míos, no de una abominación del vacío! ¡Ni los pensamientos y palabras futuros del lexmecánico que hay delante de un cogitador!».
languages.original_text: "Like what? Normal? Not special? Yes! To the void with all my 'talents' and 'abilities'! It's the first time I can hear my own thoughts, {name}! They're mine, not some warp abomination's! And not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic at the cogitator next to me!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Como qué? ¿Normal? ¿Nada especial? ¡Al vacío con mis "talentos" y "capacidades"! ¡Es la primera vez que oigo mis propios pensamientos, {name}! ¡Son míos, no de una abominación del vacío! ¡No son los pensamientos y palabras futuros de un lexmecánico que hablará conmigo junto a un cogitador!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nämlich? Normal? Nicht besonders? Ja! In die Leere mit all meinen 'Talenten' und 'Fähigkeiten'! Ich kann zum ersten Mal meine eigenen Gedanken hören, {name}! Meine, nicht die irgendeiner Abscheulichkeit aus dem Warp! Und nicht die zukünftigen Gedanken und Worte irgendeines Lexmechanicus an den Cogitator neben mir!"
languages.original_text: "Like what? Normal? Not special? Yes! To the void with all my 'talents' and 'abilities'! It's the first time I can hear my own thoughts, {name}! They're mine, not some warp abomination's! And not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic at the cogitator next to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Nämlich? Normal? Nicht besonders? In die Leere mit all meinen 'Talenten' und 'Fähigkeiten'! Ich kann zum ersten Mal meine eigenen Gedanken hören, {name}! Meine, nicht die irgendeiner Abscheulichkeit aus dem Warp! Nicht die zukünftigen Gedanken und Worte irgendeines Lexmechanicus, der an einem Cogitator neben mir steht!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Normale, vous voulez dire ? Sans rien de spécial ? Ha ! Que le vide emporte mes "talents" et mes "capacités" ! C'est la première fois que j'entends mes propres pensées, {name} ! Les miennes à moi, et pas celles d'une abomination du Warp ! Ni les futures pensées d'un quelconque lexmécanicien juste parce qu'il se tient à côté d'un cogitateur près de moi ! »
languages.original_text: "Like what? Normal? Not special? Yes! To the void with all my 'talents' and 'abilities'! It's the first time I can hear my own thoughts, {name}! They're mine, not some warp abomination's! And not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic at the cogitator next to me!"

traits.locale_text: « Normalement, vous voulez dire ? Sans rien de spécial ? Que le vide emporte mes "talents" et mes "capacités" ! C'est la première fois que j'entends mes propres pensées, {name} ! Les miennes à moi, et pas celles d'une abomination du Warp ! Ni les futures pensées d'un quelconque lexmécanicien juste parce qu'il se tient à côté d'un cogitateur près de moi ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ne gibi? Normal mi? Sıradan mı? Evet! Tüm 'hünerlerimin' de 'kabiliyetlerimin' de uçsuzun dibine kadar yolu var! Ömrümde ilk kez kendi düşüncelerimi duyabiliyorum {name}! Bir öteboyut garabetinin değil, kendimin! Yanımdaki bir kavramsayarla uğraşan bir Lexmekanik'in gelecekte düşüneceği veya diyeceği bir şeyleri de değil!"
languages.original_text: "Like what? Normal? Not special? Yes! To the void with all my 'talents' and 'abilities'! It's the first time I can hear my own thoughts, {name}! They're mine, not some warp abomination's! And not the future thoughts and words of some random Lexmechanic at the cogitator next to me!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne gibi? Normal mi? Özel olmayarak mı? Evet! Tüm 'hünerlerimin' de 'kabiliyetlerimin' de uçsuzun dibine kadar yolu var! Ömrümde ilk kez kendi düşüncelerimi duyabiliyorum {name}! Bir öteboyut garabetinin değil, kendimin! Yanımdaki bir kavramsayarda duran bir Lexmekanik'in gelecekte düşüneceği veya diyeceği bir şeyler de değil!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
